title: Asahi-Ryokuken Yomiuri Memorial
text: The Asahi-Ryokuken Yomiuri Memorial was a professional <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament that was held at the Asoiizuka Golf Club near <a href="Keisen%2C%20Fukuoka">Keisen</a> in <a href="Fukuoka%20Prefecture">Fukuoka Prefecture</a>, Japan from 2004 to 2006. It was on the <a href="Japan%20Golf%20Tour">Japan Golf Tour</a>. The purse for the final event in 2006 was <a href="Japanese%20yen">¥</a>100,000,000, with ¥20,000,000 going to the winner.
